item.description:
Greetings,

We have decided to have the next NH Vegan/Animal Rights meetup at Hermanos (Mexican) Restuarant at 11 Hills Ave in Concord, NH.

Hermanos is now offering vegan "cheese" and seitan in most of their menu selections. They also make a delicious vegan chocolate cake that you have to save room for. Several meetup members have visited Hermanos recently and are raving about the vegan options.

We are looking forward to eating at Hermanos with vegans, vegetarians, and carnivores--all are invited to attend.

The website for Hermanos is: http://www.hermanosme...
item.name: October Meetup in Concord
